sentences.en: Experts have differing views on the subject.
sentences.cn: 在这个问题上专家们意见不同。

sentences.en: I differ with you on that point.
sentences.cn: 在那一点上我们意见有分歧.

sentences.en: One's opinion tends to differ in accordance with one's standpoint.
sentences.cn: 不同的立场势必形成不同的见解.
那就是我俩看法不一的地方。

sentences.en: that's your opinion—I beg to differ.
sentences.cn: 那是你的观点，恕我不能苟同。

sentences.en: The Kantian categories differ from those of Aristotle in being subjective.
sentences.cn: 康德哲学的范畴与亚里士多德哲学的范畴的不同在于其主观性.

sentences.en: The story he told police differed from the one he told his mother.
sentences.cn: 他告诉警察的话和告诉他母亲的不同。

sentences.en: The twin brothers are alike in appearance but differ greatly in disposition.
sentences.cn: 这对孪生兄弟外貌很相像,但性格却相差很大.

sentences.en: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.cn: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

sentences.en: The two theories differ from each other in many ways.
sentences.cn: 这两种理论彼此间的不同是多方面的.

sentences.en: These bags differ in size, but not in shape.
sentences.cn: 这些手提包只是大小不同, 并无形状之异.

sentences.en: These two regions differ greatly in climate.
sentences.cn: 这两个地区气候差异很大.

sentences.en: They differ in degree rather than in kind.
sentences.cn: 他们的程度不同,并非性质不同.

sentences.en: Things in the world differ from each other in a thousand ways.
sentences.cn: 世界上的事物是千差万别的.

sentences.en: We differ about [ on ] the matter [ question ].
sentences.cn: 对这件事 ( 这个问题 ) 我们意见不同.

sentences.en: Your needs can differ from day to day.
sentences.cn: 你的需要每天可能都会不同。

words.tran_cn: 不同的；个别的，与众不同的

phrases.tran_cn: （因双方都不愿妥协或未被说服而）停止争论
不同在；在…方面存在不同
见仁见智；各人意见不同；不能达成一致意见；看法不一

trans.tran_en: to be different from something in some way
to be different from something in some way
